src:
EXO members act as superheroes in new CF for Lotte Duty Free
07 Nov 2019, 20:21 by sl278
The EXO boys are back and ready for their comeback, and it looks like they're starting to participate in more CFs in order to prepare for it!
The new CF for Lotte Duty Free shows the EXO members in a battle against all that isn't 'fun', leading to an epic battle CF that shows off the boys handsome charms.
Check it out above!
